rooms.description: A welcoming space with a reception area that includes a display for guests, incorporating Art Deco style motifs.
Open-concept living room with elegant Art Deco detailing and large windows facing east to maximize morning light.
Multipurpose studio space that serves as a combined living area and workspace, with flexible partitioning for privacy.
Modern private gym equipped with essential fitness equipment, designed in the Art Deco style to complement the overall aesthetic.
Functional and well-organized kitchen with Art Deco fixtures and efficient layout adhering to Indian building norms.

openings.location: North of the plot, aligned with Vastu principles for auspicious entry.
East facing windows in living room and studio apartment for natural lighting.

openings.description: A dedicated pathway leading from the entrance hall to a large garden area that surrounds the cottage.
A private access route from the ground floor to the swimming pool located in the west corner of the plot.
